original_text: And they that be wise shall shine as the brightness of the firmament; and they that turn many to righteousness as the stars for ever and ever.
korean_text: 지혜 있는 자는 궁창의 빛과 같이 빛날 것이요 많은 사람을 옳은 데로 돌아오게 한 자는 별과 같이 영원토록 빛나리라

sentences.original_text: shall shine as the brightness of the firmament
and they that turn many to righteousness
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 많은 사람을 의로운 길로 돌이키는 자들은

sentences.original_text: as the stars for ever and ever
